title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the value boxes in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
EB: When previewing and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the value boxes in the Enter Parameters dialog should display the default values.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters. 2. Set default values for the parameters. 3. Drag the parameters to the layout. 4. Preview the report and click the Show Report Parameters button.
